scripts.deploy:dev: AWS_KEY=$AWS_KEY AWS_SECRET=$AWS_SECRET PROFILE=$PROFILE_DEV STAGE=$STAGE_DEV && serverless config credentials -o --provider aws --key $AWS_KEY --secret $AWS_SECRET -n $PROFILE && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy -v --stage $STAGE --aws-profile $PROFILE
scripts.deploy:prod: AWS_KEY=$AWS_KEY AWS_SECRET=$AWS_SECRET PROFILE=$PROFILE_PROD STAGE=$STAGE_PROD && serverless config credentials -o --provider aws --key $AWS_KEY --secret $AWS_SECRET -n $PROFILE && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy -v --stage $STAGE --aws-profile $PROFILE
